titleStmt.title: SII 7.103: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 103. (A.R. No. 94 of 1900). IN THE SAME PLACE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrīḥ . tiruvāykkeḻvimuṉṉāka tribhuvanaccakravat=tikaḷ maturaiyu miḻamuṅ
karuvūrum pāṇṭiyan muṭittalaiyuṅ koṇṭu virābhiṣekamum vijayābhiṣekamu
m paṇṇiyaruḷiya tribhuvanaviradevaṟkku yāṇṭu muppattumuṉṟāvatu jayaṅkoṇṭacoḻamaṇṭalat
tup palakuṉṟakkoṭṭattuc ceṅkuṉṟanāṭṭuk kalavaiyāna rācanārāyaṇaccaturvvedimaṅgalat
tut teṉpiṭākai taṭṭaicceriyāna Aḻakiyacoḻanallūr nañcey puñcey viḷainilattu
ṉellai muṟṟumuṭaiyār tiruvottūruṭaiyanāyaṉārkku devadānamāka viṭṭeṉ ceṅkeṇi Am
maiyappaṉ Aḻakiyacoḻaṉāṉa campuvarāyaṉeṉ Iṉṉāyaṉār devadānaṅkaḷāṉa tiruvottū
rum vayalūrum kaṉṟiyamum śrīkāḻiṉāṭāṉviḷākamum cirāḷupaṭṭum Aṇṭiliyum Uḷḷiṭṭa Ūr
kaḷil veṭṭi taṉiyāḷ ciṟupāṭikāval Eṭuttukkoṭṭi Arimukkai Uḷḷiṭṭa nellāyamum kācāyamuṅ ko
llaip puñcai Erimiṉpāṭṭam Ācuvikaḷperkkaṭamai taṟiyiṟai cālikar vāṇikar peraāṟkaṭamai cekku
kaṭamai kuṟṟatteṇṭam paṭṭitteṇṭam koyilaṉtarāyam Uḷḷiṭṭaṉa Epperṟ paṭṭaṉavum tiruvot
tūruṭaiyaṉāyaṉārkku pāṭṭaṉpāṭṭaṉ viṭṭapaṭiye taṭṭaicceriyāṉa Aḻakiyacoḻa
ṉallūrilu mippaṭiyāl vantaṉa Epperṟpaṭṭaṉavum tiruvottūruṭaiyaṉāyaṉārkku
viṭṭeṉ ceṅkeṇi Ammaiyappaṉ Aḻakiyacoḻaṉāṉa Etirilicoḻaccampuvarāyaṉeṉ
Itukku Ilaṅkaṉam paṇṇuvār keṅkaiyiṭaik kumariyiṭaic ceytār ceyta pāvaṅ
koḷvār .
Digital edition of SII 7.103 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
